text: Pablo Sarabia García (; born 11 May 1992) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Premier League club Wolverhampton Wanderers and the Spain national team. Mainly an attacking midfielder, he can also play as a right winger. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup
